name: Validation
command:
import importlib
importerFunction = importlib.import_module('general.modules_importer.modules_importer_function')
try:
	importlib.reload(importerFunction)
except:
	reload(importerFunction)
importerFunction.importModule('puzzle_maya.validation.controller.main')
